summary: Adorn your loading screens with these muatra-bending quotes from the one and only Michael Kirkbride, savior of the lore and creator of the Elder Scrolls.
descriptionHtml:
Adds over 50 invigorating loading screen quotes from none other than the esteemed Michael Kirkbride himself, featuring such classics as:
[quote]"In the Free Association of C0DA it doesn't even matter if your dovahkiin didn't twilight sparkle because now it does in the cloud."[/quote][quote]"JUBAL! THE SLEEPERS HAVE AWAKENED!"[/quote]And...
[quote]"[TEXT REDACTED BY ELDER COUNCIL]"[/quote]All quotes were pulled directly from dear Michael's own reddit account at http://reddit.com/u/mkirkbride and have not been edited in any way, only taken out of context. Not that knowing the context makes any difference...
author: MilkBreakTime
